titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Benzoic acid 3,4,5-trihydroxy-, propyl ester.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Benzoic acid 3,4,5-trihydroxy-, propyl ester.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Benzoic acid 3,4,5-trihydroxy-, propyl ester.
